name: Robo-Charge-1x1
title: Robot Charging Station 1x1
description: Mod adds three small Roboports that can recharge 4 robots, but have no docking/inventory slots. They have 1/2, 1/4, 1/8 the range of a normal roboport.  Adds Roboport with the signal off (allows charging/docking/but no range increase).  Mining the no signal roboport returns a normal roboport.
